General.Name: Actron Technology
General.Description: Actron Technology Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic components of vehicles for automakers worldwide. It offers power modules; high and low cup, and JP pressfit diodes; dish diodes; and TO-220, standard, micro, and jumbo button diodes. The company also provides alternators, regulators, and anti-lock brake system controls. Actron Technology Corporation was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 12, Nankan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 338
